VerdantGrove.message:
Life-giver flowers turned lethal, Alpha touch needed to end the evil
Non-Grovekin's hand must do the deed, Or the deadly poison will not recede

Gemsoria.message:
Crystal heart once whole, now in shards it lies. Energy wanes as each shard slowly petrifies.
Gemsorians blind to shards, lost in their plight. Seek the shards, restore the heart's light.
